description.p: Play and practice a pop song on piano and drums. Shows notes in a "pianoroll" format that's a little bit fancy.

You practice the piano parts and the background tracks sync to your tempo. Our aim is to get a song into our head and fingers.
The real notes of the song can be simplifed down to one note per hand max. And your hands can stay in one position.
Any midi file can become a song for you to practice and play.
More description / install docs / screenshots on the website (see Links).

description.p: Fixed bad bug that wan't refreshing screen. Testers needed - please help - stephen.hazel@hey.com . Recordings are now properly saved in 3_done directory with recSave command. Cue editing is fixed. EZ mode makes a new note upon any chord change. You can hop to a random song in your midi dir now.
syn plays all sounds properly. new song2wav to render .wav for a song. it, sfz2syn, mod2song, midimp now have GUIs (in Song List dialog). improved docs on my website.

find song crash fixed. open text editor properly. txt2song crash fixed. txt2song now shows errors in a dialog. fixed note chopping across columns. songkill would fail due to old dirs. limited song filename width to prevent horiz scrolling.
